recommendation.message: Switch to a plan with atmost 50% renewable energy.

provider_info.description of the company: PG&E is a utility company focused on clean energy solutions, infrastructure improvements, and sustainability efforts, aiming to reduce carbon emissions and offer reliable energy to homes and businesses.

recommendation.recommended_plan: Switch to the optimized plan for carbon removal.

provider_info.description of the company: Climeworks captures CO₂ directly from the air using DAC technology, then stores or uses it to fight climate change.
Carbon Engineering develops DAC technology to capture CO₂ from the atmosphere for large-scale removal or utilization.

our_recommendation.description of the company: Climeworks captures CO₂ directly from the air using DAC technology, then stores or uses it to fight climate change.

recommendation.message: Switch to a plan with renewable energy between 50% and 75%.

provider_info.description of the company: As a Community Choice Energy program, we’re committed to adding renewable energy to the grid and finding solutions to improve reliability for the health of our customers and planet.We build and source clean electricity for you so just by being our customer, you’re helping to improve air quality, reduce pollution, and fight climate change.

Ava Community Energy (Ava) exists to provide more renewable energy at competitive rates to our customers. We reinvest the earnings back into the community to create local green energy jobs, local programs, and clean power projects. We supply electricity to all accounts (residential, business, and municipal) and PG&E delivers it to you.

Since 2010, MCE has set the standard for clean energy in California. Our team is dedicated to fostering an equitable, clean, affordable, and reliable energy economy, guided by a commitment to our community. MCE is governed by a board of local elected officials who ensure our work reflects the unique needs of all our member communities.
